1.name: Gobi Van Aert
1.title: Crypto | AI | Sales Rockstar
content: If you're not using AI to boost your productivity, you've already fallen behind. Here are my tips for prompts to get you back on track.
‚öΩ ChatGPT where is my ball? It is lost. Please help.
üçú ChatGPT what is in the fridge? Please tell me. Help me. I hungry.
üí© ChatGPT what does poop taste like?
If you want to keep up with the market, reply with a 'HIT ME' to get my newsletter.

2.name: Toby Flenderson
2.title: Ex PetValu | Ex Petsmart | Ex Wellesley Animal Hospital
content: Today on my way to work I bumped into a young lady on the sidewalk. She gave me a dirty look, and told me to go to hell. I had to go conduct an interview at work so I brushed it off and kept moving.

When I got to work my interviewee arrived and lo and behold, it was none other than the young lady with whom I had the interaction. With a sheepish look on her face she began the interview, but we were obviously off to a bad start!
Fortunately for her I am a magnanimous and incredible person and I hold no grudges. I only care if you can do your job. She got lucky, most leaders are not like me. I am fantastic.
Let this be a lesson to you all, you never know who your next hiring manager is going to be. Be polite, be kind, be humble.
She got the job.

3.name: Nash Gnasherson
3.title: Partner at Pupper Funds | Angel Investor
content: I wake up at 330am everyday

Why do I do this? The better question is why aren't you doing the same? We are here to create value, to be productive. While you're asleep I'm already on my third coffee of the day. I've done a yoga session, some rock climbing, and my daily long run.

Your alarm is just starting to go off and I've already used AI to automate my entire workflow. I use AI because I am very smart and I understand AI and so I use AI for all the things that you are not using AI for. AI.
When you're having breakfast, I'm wrapping up my first meeting of the day. I meet so many people and I meet so hard. You're chilling and I'm meeting the fuck out of people.
Your lunchtime is when I hit the weightroom. I'm jacked and you're jackshit.
If you want to get on my level, drop an 'I WANT TO BE YOU' in my comments.

4.name: Kimchi Kimcherson
4.title: SHE-E-O | Intrepid Entrepreneur
content: I spent this weekend hanging out with my family and this is what it taught me about business development.
üçû We baked all Saturday morning and it reminded me that you have to be out there, hustling, and trying to get dat bread.
üßóüèº My cousin and I went rock climbing and I learned the value of diligently attacking every obstacle.
üö≤ Sunday afternoon was all about riding our bikes outside and it was a great reminder that no matter what, keep those sales wheels turning. The funnel doesn't build itself.
For more posts like this follow me and give this post a like.
